turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Huddersfield Giants.
turn.1: What year did the Huddersfield Giants season start?
turn.2: After a poor dip in form Ken Davy decided it was time for change and terminated the contracts of coach Nathan Brown and captain Kevin Brown.
turn.4: Paul Anderson was given the task of finishing the season as best as possible.
turn.5: Did they win any awards or trophies?
turn.6: In 2013, Huddersfield won the League Leader's Shield, the first time they have finished top of the league in 81 years.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: 5 of the team were selected for the Super League Dream Team, more than any other club.
turn.9: Did they have any other star players?
turn.10: In 2014, the club celebrated the 100th anniversary of the "Team of all Talents" who won "All Four Cups" in 1914, by playing in heritage jerseys to commemorate the feat.
turn.11: What other anniversaries did they have?
turn.12: During the 2016 season, after a run of bad form, the club sacked Anderson as head coach, with Andy Kelly taking charge on an interim basis for a few games.
